titleStmt.title: SII 8.199: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 199. (A.R. No. 602 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL STRINE IN THE UTTAMAR TEMPLE AT PICHCHANDARKOVIL, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiṅkaḷertaru tan ṟoṅkal veṇkuṭaik kiḻ nilamakaḷ
nilava malarmakaḷ puṇarntu ceṅko loccik karuṅkali kaṭin
tu taṉ ciṟiyatātaiyum taṉ ṟiruttamaiyaṉum
ḷ taṉ ṉiḷaṅkokkaḷaiyum neṟikuṇar taṉ ṟirupputal
varraiyum n=tuṉṟeḻil vānavaṉ minavaṉ kaṅkaṉ ni
laṅkaiya riṟaivaṉ pulaṅkaḻal naṟpallavaṉ kaṉṉakucciyarkā
vala nenap poṉnaṇi cuṭarmaṇi makuṭam cūṭṭip paṭarpukaḻ ḻā
ṅkavaṟ kavar nāṭaruḷip pāṅkuṟa maṉnu pallūḻiyuḷ teṉnavar
muvaruḷ mānāparaṇaṉ poṉmuṭi yānāp parumaṇip pacun=talaip
porukaḷat tarittu vāraḷaviyakaḻal virakeraḷanai munaivaiyiṟ turatti
t tantivāraṇak kaṭakkaḷiṟṟāl Utaippittaruḷi An=tamil perumpuka
ḻ cun=tarapāṇṭiyaṉ Oṟṟai veṇkuṭaiyum kaṟṟai veṇ
kavariyum ciṅkātanamum veṅkaḷat tiḻattu taṉ muṭi viḻat talai
virit taṭitaḷa n=toṭa tollai mullaiyūr turatti Olkali
l veṇāṭṭaraicai ceṇāṭ ṭotukki mevupuka ḻirāmakuṭa
muvar keṭa munit=tu miṭaṟkeḻu villavar kuṭarmaṭik koṇ
ṭu taṉ nāṭuviṭ ṭoṭik kāṭupuk koḷippa vañciyam⌈
potumalar malain tāṅkeñcalil velaikeḻu kān=ta
ḷurccālai kalamaṟuppit tāhavamallanum Añcak kevutaṉ ṟāṅkarum paṭaiyāl lāṅkavaṉ ceṉaiyuḷ kaṇṭappaiyanum kaṅkātaraṉum vaṇṭamar kaḷiṟṟoṭu maṭiyat tiṇṭiṟal virutār vikkiyum
vicaipātittanum tanmuraḷc cāṅkamaiyanum mutalinar samarabhiruvaottuṭaiya nimircuṭar ponno ṭayaṅkari puraviyoṭum piṭittu tan nāṭaiyiṟ jayaṅkoṇṭu tunnār koḷḷippākkai
Oḷḷeṟi maṭuttu Oru tanittaṇṭār porutirai Uṭutta Ilaṅkaiyarkomakan vikkiramavāhuviṉ viḷaṅkum Oru makuṭamum munṟenak kuṭain=tu teṉ Īḻamaṇṭalam muḻuvatum Iḻan=tu Eḻkaṭal līḻam pukku Ilaṅkeca
nākiya vikkiramapāṇṭiyaṉ parumaṇi makuṭamum kāṇṭaku tanatākki kannakucciyar Ārkaṭal liḻam ciriteṉ ṟeṇṇi Uḷaṅkoḷ tan nāṭu taṉ nuṟavoṭum pukun=tu viḷaṅku muṭikavitta viracalāmekaṉ porkkaḷattañci kārkaḷuṟu I
ḻan=tu kavvaiyiṟ ṟoṭik kātaliyoṭum tan ṟavvaiyaip piṭittavan tāyai mukkariya Āṅkabhimānam niṅkutaṟkāka miṇṭu van=tavaṉ vāṭṭoḻil Iḻan=tu veṅkaḷattulan=ta vacciṅkaḷattaraiyan ponnaṇi muṭiyuṅ koṇ
ṭu kanṉaraṉ vaḻivan=tu Araikoḷ Īḻattaraicarākiya śrīvallavan matanaraājan Elloḷi cuṭarmaṇi muṭiyuṅ koṇṭu vaṭapulat tirukālāvatu porupaṭai naṭātti kaṇṭartinakaran nāraṇaṉ kaṇavati vaṇṭalar⌈
teriyal matucūtaṉaneṉ ṟeṉaip pala varaicarai muṉaivayiṟt turatti vampalartaru poḻil kampilinakaruḷ caḷukkiyar māḷikai takarppit tiḷakkamil villavar minavar veḷkulac caḷukkiyar valla
var kauvucalar vaṅkaṇar koṅkaṇar ciṅkaḷar paṅkayā An=taṇar mutalinar Araicarroṭu muṟaikaḷum m ĀṟilOn ṟavaniyuḷ kūṟukoḷ poruḷkaḷum Ukantu nāṉmaṟaiyavar mukan=tuko
ḷak kuṭuttu viśvalokattu viḷaṅka mannuneṟi niṉṟa Aśvametakañ ceytu Araicuviṟṟirun=ta jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻaṉ Uyarn=ta perumpukaḻ śrīkovirājakecaripanmarāna Uṭaiyār
śrīrājādhirājadevaṟkku yāṇṭu 3 10tāvatu rājāśrayavaḷanāṭṭup pāccilkūṟṟattu kiḻpalāṟṟu brahmadeyam kuṇacilamaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Eṅkaḷur tirukkarampan=tuṟai mahādevaṟku nāṅkaḷ Iṟaikāvalākac ceytu
kuṭutta nilamāvatu . tirukkarampan=tu ṟai Āḻvār śrīkoyilukku kiḻakku Iṉnilattukku Icaitta Ellai kiḻpārkkellai kaṇavatiyār cekkumāṭat tiṭalukku meṟkum teṉpārkkellai vāttalainiṉṟu pona vākkālukku
vaṭakkum melpārkkellai tirukkoyilukkum tirunan=tavānattukkum kiḻakkum vaṭapārkkellai meṟkunokkip pona Āṟṟukkālukku teṟkum Āka Ivvicaitta vinnāṉkellaiyuḷ Akappaṭṭa nirnilam mikutikkuṟai vuḷ
ḷaṭaṅka Innilam muṟṟum Itiṉaṭut tirutteyamacakkalukku Icaitta Ellai kiḻpārkkellai mun kuṟitta nilattukku meṟkum teṉpārkkellai tirunan=tavānattukku vaṭakkum meṟpārkkellai kacattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapārkkellai Āṟṟu
kkālukku teṟkkum Ivvicaitta Ellaikku Uḷpaṭṭa nilattu teṟkaṭaiya nilam Orumāvum paṇṭu Uṇṭuvarukiṟa nilam Iluppaiccey mukkāṇiyum viṇṇavanmacakkal kiḻaināṟṟaṅkāl Oru māvum Āka kuṟikkap
paṭṭa nilam Araiye Iraṇṭumā mukkāṇiyum mikutikkuṟai vuḷḷaṭaṅka Innilam munṟumā Ittevaṟku Iṟaikāvalākac ceytukuṭuttu Itevar śrīhastattil nāṉ koṇṭa pon ṉāṟkaḻañ caraiyum I
ppoṉ patiṉkaḻañ caraiyum kācukkarutittuḷaiyil
Uraiyilum niṟaiyilum vaḻuvātatu tippokkuc cem
poṉ Ippon pāccilkallāl Āvaṇakkaḷiyile kaiccela
k koṇṭa pon mukkaḻañcum paṇṭu nāṅkaḷ Ittevarkku
Olaiyāl kaṭavomāy niṉṟa pon Eḻukaḻañcaraiyum
kallālk koṇṭu Ikkuṟikkappaṭṭa nilam Iṟaikāvalākaccey
tukuṭuttom tirukkarampiśvaramahādevaṟku pramāṇappaṭi cilā
lekhai ceytukuṭuttom brahmadeyam kuṇacila
maṅkalattu sabhaiyom . sabhai paṇikka Ipramāṇa
m Eḻutineṉ Innāṭṭu brahmateyat taccan niyamattu ⌈
veyaṉ tirumāl puruṣottamaneṉ Ivai Eṉ neḻut
tu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ pāratāyaṉ tevaṉ māṟaneṉ Aṟivan .
Ippaṭi Aṟiven kaviṇiyaṉ Arukaṉ kaṇṇaneṉ Aṟivan .
Ippaṭi Aṟiven kaviciyan rāma teva nakkaṉneṉ Aṟivan
Ippaṭi Aṟiven kaviciyan Āticcelvan viḻumiyānnen A
ṟivan . Ippaṭi Aṟiven pāratāyan vijjāttiran tiruvempa⌈
neṉ Aṟivan . Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai . śrīvayiṣṇava ra⌈
kṣai. Itanmam rakṣittāṉUṭaiya śrīpātam kaṇṇan
tinman talai melana .
